articles.title: New therapeutic approach targets PCSK9 to regulate blood cholesterol levels
articles.description: When the amount of cholesterol in the blood is too high, hypercholesterolemia can develop, causing serious damage to the arteries and cardiovascular health.

articles.title: The Beach Boys co-founder Brian Wilson dies
articles.description: Brian Wilson was the California band's visionary leader and songwriter, penning hits including Surfin' USA, Good Vibrations and God Only Knows.
articles.content:
Brian Wilson - the co-founder of The Beach Boys - has died at the age of 82.
In a statement, published on his website, his family said: "We are heartbroken to announce that our beloved father Brian Wilson has passed away.

articles.description: Musician, who suffered from mental health problems, wrote and produced the 1966 album Pet Sounds – seen by many as the greatest album of all time
